# spdlog-telegram

[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/github-spdlog--telegram-blue?style=flat-square&logo=github)](https://github.com/SpriteOvO/spdlog-telegram)
[![](https://img.shields.io/crates/v/spdlog-telegram?style=flat-square&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://crates.io/crates/spdlog-telegram)
[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/docs.rs-spdlog--telegram-ff69b4?style=flat-square&logo=rust)](https://docs.rs/spdlog-telegram)
[![](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/SpriteOvO/spdlog-telegram/ci.yml?branch=main&style=flat-square&logo=githubactions&logoColor=white)](https://github.com/SpriteOvO/spdlog-telegram/actions/workflows/ci.yml)

Sends logs to Telegram, based on [spdlog-rs].

This crate provides a sink `TelegramSink` which sends logs to Telegram recipients via Telegram Bot API.

## Examples

See directory [./examples].
